name: Dodge City Getaway
description:
Dodge City Getaway is a 2 player split-screen, 3rd person driving and shooting game, where you play as wild west bandits escaping the law. One player drives your carriage forward, picking up ammo for the other player who fires the ammo out of a slingshot mounted on the back of the carriage

This project was created fully remote during the Covid19 pandemic.

Game Design
Naveen Sai Nikhil Balam - Environment Art, Prop Art
Emanuele Corbellini - Level Design, Level Art, Lighting
Anne Friesen - Gameplay Programming
Lily Page - Programming, Project Management
Nick Rosenthal - Character Art, UX/UI Art, VFX Art

Sound Design
Bettina Calmon - Original Music
Giancarlo Granata - Sound Design

Voice Talent
Jason Howard as Jailbreak Jerry
Kyrsten Leigh as Buckshot Betty
Aidan Lytton as Lasso Larry
Victor Zamboli as Barrel Bob
